import React, {useState} from "react"; import {Container } from "react-bootstrap"; import axios from 'axios'; function Form() { const [courseCode, setCourseCode] = useState('EMPTY CLASS CODE'); const [courseRating, setCourseRating] = useState(0); const [workload, setWorkload] = useState(0); const [profRating, setProfRating] = useState(0); const [comment, setComment] = useState(""); const submitForm = async() => { await axios.post('http://localhost:4000/submitRating', { course: courseCode, prof: profRating, }) .catch(() => { console.log("ERR in new submit form") }) } return (
setCourseCode(event.target.value)} placeholder="CS-422"/>


setCourseRating(1)} />
setCourseRating(2)} />
setCourseRating(3)} />


setProfRating(1)} />
setProfRating(2)} />
setProfRating(3)} />


setWorkload(1)} />
setWorkload(2)} />
setWorkload(3)} />




) } export default Form;
